name: Starfleet Pilot
description:
You are a brave Starfleet Pilot, stranded on a hostile planet. A glitch in the warp module, teleported your ship 10 kilometers away from the wormhole that can take you home, and your only hope is to blitz through the enemies and hazards of this planet to escape.

Features

Starfleet Pilot is a fast-paced mobile endless runner-type game. It is currently in development and as of now, we have the have the following fleshed out:

  • procedural level generation, and good progression foundation
  • fully designed a wasteland planet biome type
  • destructible terrain objects
  • destructible chests
  • two types of enemies: drones, tanks
  • upgrade system
  • solid gyroscope-based movement *
  • ♫ two music tracks you can listen to right now ♫

There are many more planned features, so if you like what you see, consider supporting us here or through itch.io (https://dejw.itch.io/starfleet-pilot). This would help us finish this game which we are developing after hours.

  • You control the ship by turning the phone from side to side, and pressing anywhere on the screen to fire. We will be adding an alternative control scheme before launching the game.

Developed by ##

Dawid Fatyga - Design, graphics, programming
Mateusz Janik - Music, sound
